H0.text: What is the principal language of Bulgaria. Russian

H1.text: What is the principal language of Bulgaria. Turkish

H2.text: What is the principal language of Bulgaria. Greek

H3.text: What is the principal language of Bulgaria. Bulgarian

A4.text: Bulgarian is the official language of Bulgaria, where it is used in all spheres of public life.

A5.text: It is the official language of Bulgaria, and since 2007 has been among the official languages of the European Union.
